title: ariinv
author: ariinv
content: For those who are not aware of the trading campaign or are new in this business, The purpose of a trading campaign is to turn a small amount of money into a vast sum over a short period using high volatility market conditions. A trader must build a project plan based on intervals to accomplish a trading campaign. Follow the instruction mentioned on Probit global website, and we wish you an excellent profit in a short period!Happy Trading!ARISTO (ARII)https://ariinv.com/Your account should meet the conditions below to participate in this trading competition.PROB StakeRequirements100 PROB or moreA total of 100,000 ARII is ready!START TRADINGLinks will appear after the event starts.The Higher your membership level, The Lower your transaction fees. See DetailsINFORMATIONMY RANKLogin is required.START2022-08-22 10:30 (GMT+4)END2022-09-04 10:30 (GMT+4)PRIZES1st20,000 ARII2nd15,000 ARII3rd12,000 ARII4th10,000 ARII5th9,000 ARII6th8,500 ARII7th8,000 ARII8th7,000 ARII9th5,500 ARII10th5,000 ARIILEADER BOARDRankE-mailConverted (USDT)UpcomingNOTICEYour staked PROB amount canâ€™t be decreased during the competition duration.There may be differences with actual results due to periodically updated rankings.The trading competition rank is based on the trading amount converted into USDT.
